definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society

sentences.english: We are all Japanese. We all need to help each other.
sentences.chinese: 我們都是日本人，因此需要互相幫助。

sentences.english: Ah, then we can both help each other.
sentences.chinese: 啊，那麼我們兩人可以互相幫助了。

sentences.english: Being David and Johnthan, they always help each other when in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 作爲生死之交，他們總是在危急時刻互相幫助。

sentences.english: They like to help each other.
Alice and Kitty always help each other.
sentences.chinese: 愛麗絲和基蒂總是互相幫助。

sentences.english: Helping each other to remove the gypsum.
Cooperation and mutual help between factories has become the order of the day.
sentences.chinese: 廠際協作和互相幫助已蔚然成風。

sentences.english: Cross-training allows people to assist in congested areas.
sentences.chinese: 在人口稠密的地區，交叉培訓可使人們進行互相幫助。

sentences.english: All other relations and relationship-defined obligations follow the same logic: they all involve mutual help.
sentences.chinese: 其他人倫關係都是同樣的道理，都是互相幫助。

sentences.english: Their parents should encourage and help them, and in no wise hinder them from following God's call.
sentences.chinese: 該當勉勵相幫他們，萬不可阻撓兒童隨天主的聖召。

sentences.english: In school all my classmates help one another.
sentences.chinese: 在學校同學們互相幫助。

sentences.english: Co-ordination and mutual help between factories has become the order of the day.
sentences.chinese: 廠際協作和互相幫助已蔚然成風。

sentences.english: Paul Rusesabagina: General, these are difficult times, we need to help one another.
sentences.chinese: 將軍，現在是艱難時期，我們必須互相幫助。

sentences.english: We should help each other, for people running businesses here are the same age as us.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏做生意的都是我們的老表，我們應該互相幫助。

sentences.english: We work very hard.We help each other.
sentences.chinese: 我們學習很努力，大家互相幫助。
